detectors.description:
PiSwap (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#216-233) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- IERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#7)
	- IERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#10)
	- IERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#6)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#53-55)
	- ERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#43-45)
	- ERC20.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#49-52)
	- IERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#8)
	- ERC20.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#60-64)
	- IERC20.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#5)
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#56-59)
	- ERC20.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#46-48)
	- IERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/PiSwap.sol#9)
